hive_lesson.title: 987 Class Crush
hive_lesson.description: Crystal gives George female advice on women.

hive_text_custom.text: Hey, Crystal, I need some advice yo!
So, there's this like red-headed girl in class and
I kind of got a crush on her
Uuurr! But, yeah, I don't know, you know, how to ask her out. I don't even know if she knows my name, but yeah.
I would personally just be natural and just
I don't know. For my personal advice I think you should just go straight forward and say "Hi, my name is George" and give her an appearance.
Hold on. I'm gonna write this down.
OK. And next step is "If you are free" oh, you always have to check if she's either married, or if she's a lesbian, or if she is single.
So, number three is what you're looking for.
So, if she is single, just say, hey, how about we go out for a cup of coffee or something.
And, yeah, that's how you get her.
So, yeah, what if she doesn't like coffee though? I mean, what else could we do we on a date?
. What's fun to do on a date anyway?
Fun to do on a date! It's just the fact that you're being with her and just try to get to know her more.
Wait, wait, wait one second. Do I need to pay for this?
I don't think you should pay on the first date. I think sometimes that can be
Oh, that's great because I'm totally broke.
I think you should just ask her casually, not like

, just say, "Hey, I would like to know you a little bit more, and just go out for a small little drink, like go to that new cafe that's open, like a lot of girls think that place is so cute. I think you should take her there.
But I think cafe's are boring.
Cafe's are boring. Men! Women don't think so. This is the point. Write it down.

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 1) George ______ to the girl with red hair.
2) Crystal says he needs to find out _______ .

answers: a) pay for the first day
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 4) Crystal thinks George should ________ .
5) Crystal thinks the new cafe is _____ .
